transcoder.name: Android HQ
transcoder.description: A high quality profile for fast connections and fast CPUs

transcoderConfiguration.codecParameters: -vcodec libx264 -b 1024k -vprofile baseline -preset fast -acodec aac -ab 256k -ac 2 -strict experimental -async 1 -f mpegts

transcoder.name: Android Better
transcoder.description: A high quality profile for fast connections.

transcoderConfiguration.codecParameters: -vcodec libx264 -b 768k -vprofile baseline -preset veryfast -acodec aac -ab 128k -ac 2 -strict experimental -async 1 -f mpegts

transcoder.name: Android Medium
transcoder.description: A profile that balances quality and bandwidth. For fast network data connections or slow wifi.

transcoderConfiguration.codecParameters: -vcodec libx264 -b 512k -vprofile baseline -preset veryfast -acodec aac -ab 128k -ac 2 -strict experimental -threads 2 -async 1 -f mpegts

transcoderConfiguration.codecParameters: -vcodec libx264 -b 256k -vprofile baseline -preset veryfast -acodec aac -ab 64k -ac 2 -strict experimental -async 1 -f mpegts
